meanings.definition: Having or revealing an exaggerated sense of one's own importance or abilities.
meanings.sent1: She acted arrogant by always talking about how great she was.
meanings.sent2: He was so arrogant that no one wanted to be around him.
meanings.sent3: The arrogant cat thought it was the king of the house.
meanings.sent4: Her arrogant behavior was like a dark cloud overshadowing the room.
meanings.sent5: The arrogant peacock strutted around as if it owned the whole garden.

meanings.definition: Showing an offensive attitude of superiority.
meanings.sent1: The team captain's arrogant behavior made the other players feel small.
meanings.sent2: She gave an arrogant smirk after winning the competition.
meanings.sent3: The arrogant squirrel thought it was better than all the other animals in the park.
meanings.sent4: His arrogant tone cut through the room like a sharp knife.
meanings.sent5: The arrogant eagle soared high above, looking down on everything below.
